DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect comorbid disease weight loss five year Roux-en-Y gastric bypass ( RYGB ) surgery morbid obesity .
DOC.brief_title: Comorbidity Five Years After Gastric Bypass
DOC.detailed_description: Morbid obese patient frequently comorbid disease , e.g . diabetes , hypertension , hyperlipidemia , sleep apnea . We study remission rate weight loss five year Roux-en-Y gastric bypass ( RYGB ) surgery nationwide large group patient .
DOC.criteria: Registered individual Scandinavian Obesity Surgery Registry ( SOReg ) gastric bypass All operation
